pages.title: Crafting Paintings
pages.text: $(br)Feel like creative ideas are bursting from mind?$(br2)Just try creating your own artwork on a $(#FF9900)blank painting$()!

pages.title: Palette
pages.text: $(br)To start painting, you'll first need to get a palette to help you pick colors. A few plank blocks and some dyes are the required ingredients.

pages.title: Blank Painting
pages.text: $(br)Then comes the canvas, or to say, blank painting. This recipe resembles that of vanilla paintings, except that all sticks are replaced by bamboo.$(br)Pandas will surely love them. $(br)  ^._.^
